briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate Safety and Efficacy of Infliximab in Chinese Participants With Moderate to Severe Plaque-type Psoriasis
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of Infliximab in the Treatment of Chinese Subjects With Moderate to Severe Plaque-type Psoriasis
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the superiority and efficacy of infliximab induction therapy in chinese participants with moderate to severe plaque-type psoriasis (scaly skin rash) compared with placebo (an inactive substance that is compared with a drug to test whether the drug has a real effect in a clinical trial).

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved a Greater Than Equal to 75 Percent Response in Psoriasis Area and Severity Index (PASI)
